com.iitb.android_fb5
Class AccelerometerReader

java.lang.Object
  com.iitb.android_fb5.AccelerometerReader

public class AccelerometerReader
extends java.lang.Object

Class for implementing Accelerometer sensor reading. Task: (1) Start listener for change in accelerometer values. (2) Accelerometer change listener, sending appropriate commands over BT after decoding (3) Stop accelerometer listener.
